IP = 172.16.0.4/16
Classe = B
10101100.00010000.00000000.00000100
CIDR = 16
Host = 0.4
Subnet Mask =  255.255.0.0
// 11111111.11111111.00000000.00000000
11111111.11111111.00000000 // Bloccati i primi 16 bit (3 byte)
Ip Network =  172.16.0.0
// 10101100.00010000.00000000.00000100
// 11111111.11111111.00000000.00000000
// 10101100.00010000.00000000.00000000 =  172.16.0.0

Numeri di Host disponibili = 
256 * 256 = 65536 â€“ 2 = 65534
